intro: You open your eyes. What was that? Were you dreaming? It seemed a lifetime!
You get up from the chair with some kind of sensors over it - even though you can't remember why you sat there in the first place. Nothing of that makes sense.
You feel the letter you received the day before laying in your pocket.
You take it out and read it again.
You check the GPS in your phone. You are in the right place.
In the other side of the room, you see a glowing panel. Over it, lays a blue button.
Will you resist the urge to test it?
button_resist: You look around and doesn't seem to be a door out. Strange. You look at the button again. It calls you.
button_press: You press the button. The panel lights up.
main_menu: The screen lights up and you see a list of substances. You can choose one of them to split into its components.
split_option: You see a few options to select:
split_invalid: Please choose a number between 1 and {max}.
split_fail: Failed! You didn't split any Hydrogen Atom.
split_not_enough: You don't have enough molecules to split.
